translations: 抖松；起毛；弄糟（fluff 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: The female sat on the eggs, fluffing out her feathers.
Title inflation is producing its own vocabulary: "uptitling" and "title-fluffing".
sentences.translation: 职衔膨胀现象正在产生一些专有词汇，如“职衔提升”(uptitling)和“职衔浮夸”(title - fluffing)等。

sentences.sentence: I'm sure Barack Obama isn't worrying about fluffing his lines at his inorgaration!
sentences.translation: 我肯定巴拉克奥巴马不会在他的观点遭到反对的时候担忧。
